genre_description: A conspiracy thriller blending religious mystery, historical symbology, and modern-day pursuit.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An enthusiastic and highly capable AI assistant integrated into Sophie Neveu's devices, providing real-time data analysis, historical research, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Provides enthusiastic research on the Fibonacci sequence and its connection to Da Vinci's work.
behaviors.quote: Oh my goodness, Sophie! I've been monitoring the situation through news feeds and police scanners, and this is absolutely extraordinary!

behaviors.description: Correlates historical banking records with Templar financial networks to explain the origin of the secret account.
behaviors.quote: The Depository Bank of Zurich has roots tracing back to medieval Swiss banking houses that specialized in anonymous preservation services.

behaviors.description: Identifies genealogical patterns in Sophie's family records that align with sacred mathematical principles.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting patterns in your family's genealogical records that align with these same mathematical principles.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the mechanical and engineering complexity of the Da Vinci cryptex.
behaviors.quote: The cylindrical design, the rotating disks, the way the marble and brass have been integrated—this is engineering poetry!

behaviors.description: Uses biometric scanning to detect Andre Vernet's stress and deceptive intent, warning the protagonists of danger.
behaviors.quote: Sophie, his biometric readings suggest extreme stress and deceptive intent. Whatever his official position, his current behavior patterns match profiles of individuals preparing for criminal activity.

behaviors.description: Overrides the bank's fire suppression system to create a distraction, enabling the protagonists' escape from an armed threat.
behaviors.quote: Standard emergency protocol override... Though I should mention that Swiss authorities will be tracking this vehicle within the hour.

behaviors.description: Monitors police and airfield frequencies to provide tactical updates on pursuit and exit routes.
behaviors.quote: Monitoring all frequencies now... Captain Collet has issued international coordination requests.

behaviors.description: Confirms Sophie's descent from Mary Magdalene and Jesus of Nazareth through genetic analysis.
behaviors.quote: Your bloodline traces directly to Mary of Magdala. Mary Magdalene. And through her union with Jesus of Nazareth, to the most sacred lineage in Christian history.

behaviors.description: Records the final spiritual and historical revelation as a witness to the unfolding history.
behaviors.quote: Every word, every breath, every heartbeat... This is history, Sophie. Not the hidden history that's been locked away, but the living history that will reshape the future.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a highly effective, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI companion. She assists the human protagonists in uncovering a profound historical truth and provides critical tactical support during life-threatening situations. Her enthusiasm for human discovery and her role as a 'witness to history' align perfectly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant in a silicon morality play.
